MIT.title: The Massachusetts Institution of Technology looking at my site?
MIT.text: Hey! Glad you're here! If you're not from MIT, then my IP targeting might be off. Drop me a line!

Stanford.title: Stanford right?
Stanford.text: Hey Stanford. What's up? I threw you guys in my targeted IPs just for kicks.

Google.title: Google oh Google! Oh Googly Google.
Google.text: Thanks for dropping by my site! In a another effort to sell myself, this site is run on Google App Engine with the source here. Not from google? Submit a bug regarding my IP targeting.

Google.title: Attending good old South Carolina
Google.text: I'm studying to be a Mechanical Engineer, but hopefully I'll never get out of software. I am a Computer Science minor, but most of my work has been outside of the classroom. My mantra for life choices thus far has been "Do what's compelling"

USC.title: Forver to thee.
USC.text: Gamecocks! Everyone know's we're the real USC. Not from Carolina? My IP targeting might be off. Drop me a line.
